title: National Suicide Prevention Hotline
script: Provides free and confidential support through a local call center.

title: Crisis Text Line
script: Text connection with a Crisis Counselor trained to de-escalate a crisis situation through active listening and collaborative problem solving.

title: National Sexual Assault Hotline
script: Connect with a trained staff member from a sexual assault service provider in your area that offers access to a range of free services.

title: The Trevor Project
script: A crisis intervention and suicide prevention phone service specifically centered on LGBTQ youth.

title: SAMHSA Treatment Referral Helpline
script: Speak to a live professional to get general information on mental health and treatment centers in your area.

title: National Domestic Violence Hotline
script: Trained expert advocates available 24/7 to provide confidential support to anyone experiencing domestic violence or seeking resources and information.

title: NAMI
script: Find information on symptoms of mental illness, treatment options, local support groups, and education.

title: SARDAA
script: Conference calls for schizoaffective diagnosed individuals. Separate conference calls also available for family/friend support.

title: Anxiety and Depression Association of America
script: Provides information on prevention, treatment, and symptoms of anxiety, depression and related conditions.

title: Depression and Bipolar Support Alliance
script: Povides information on bipolar disorder and depression in addition to offering in-person and online support groups and forums.

title: I'm Alive
script: A live online network that uses instant messaging to respond to people in crisis.

title: CHADD
script: Provides information and referrals on ADHD, including local support groups.

title: American Foundation for Suicide Prevention
script: Connect with a representative for referrals to support groups, mental health professionals, resources on loss, and suicide prevention information.

title: International OCD Foundation
script: Provides information on OCD and treatment referrals.
